ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Redshifted absorption with variable iron abundance. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: Redshifted photoelectric absorption with all abundances tied to Solar except for iron. Abundances are set by the set_xsabund command.
This is a multiplicative model component.

ROW.DATA: equivalent hydrogen column (in units of 10^22 cm^-2)

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.

BUGS.PARA: For a list of known bugs and issues with the XSPEC models, please visit the XSPEC bugs page.
